Package com.ibm.ruler

Interface Summary
ICastle This interface is implemented by all castles.
IKnight This interface is implemented by all knights.
IObject This interface is implemented by all objects in the game.
IPeasant This interface is implemented by all peasants.
IRuler This interface is implemented by all rulers.
 

Class Summary
Ruler This class is the superclass of the Ruler that you implement.
World This class allows you to get information about the CodeRuler environment.
